item.description:
Join us for this AMC hike in Wellfleet at White Crest Beach.  If you want to carpool and join us for breakfast, meet us at 7:30am at the back end of the parking lot of the Market Basket in Sagamore (near the Bass outlet). (Market Basket is accessible from the eastbound Exit #1 off Route 6, just over the Sagamore bridge.)  

Status:OPEN Wooded trails to Marconi White Cedar Swamp.

Directions to hike start: Rte 6 to R on Lecount Hollow Rd to beach gatehouse. L on Ocean View Rd 0.9 mi to R at beach pkg lot. Meet 9:45, 2 hrs.

Difficulty:C3C (Less than 5 miles on average terrain at moderate pace)

Offered By:Southeastern Massachusetts AMC Leader:Pat Sarantis 
508-430-9965 patsarantis@gmail.com

Registration is not required for this activity. However, you may wish to contact the AMC leader if you have any questions about the hike. (Contact us if you have questions about the carpool or breakfast, etc.)

Dogs are not allowed on AMC hikes. Bring water and snacks and wear good hiking shoes. More info about the AMC is available at www.outdoors.org .

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: White Crest Beach, Wellfleet with the AMC
